Class ClaimantReceiptActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantReceiptActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ClaimantReceiptActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    This ClaimantReceiptActivity class is an extended class of Activity class. This class controls the User Interface of Receipt for claimant. This view displays the Receipt and creates an option menu and return true as the boolean value. It will be used when the claimant asks to access to the Receipt.
    Version:
    04/07/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
